name: Haus Longhino
description:
The house Longhino is situated sunny in the district of Eckartau with a big garden and a nice view. Bus stop as well as small food store in close vicinity. Enough parking bay available.
Prices get on per day excluding final cleaning 35€,-

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 3 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: The both in 2009 to renovated holiday apartments are suited in combination also for groups to 14 people. In each case approx. 80 or 85 m ² with living space incl. seat group, kitchen unit (4 Ceranfelder, oven, dishwasher, small freezer, coffee machine, water cooker, toaster). In each case 2 double rooms and 1 three-bed room. Flat 1shower / WC as well as 1 shower and 1 WC sep. Sat TV and big balcony. Parquet floors.
